content:
Congratulations on achieving your personal best time for a 3-mile run! That's a fantastic motivator, indeed!

As for running apps, there are many great options that can help you track your progress, improve your time, and stay motivated. Here are some popular ones:

1. **Nike Run Club**: A well-rounded app that tracks your runs, provides audio cues, and offers training plans. It also integrates with Apple Watch and other wearables.
2. **Strava**: A social running app that lets you track your runs, compete with friends, and join challenges. It also provides detailed analytics and personalized coaching.
3. **Runkeeper**: A popular app that tracks your runs, sets goals, and provides audio cues. It also offers personalized training plans and integrates with many wearables.
4. **MapMyRun**: A GPS-based app that tracks your runs, provides route planning, and offers audio cues. It also integrates with many wearables and has a large community of users.
5. **Couch to 5K**: A beginner-friendly app that provides a structured training program to help you progress from walking to running. It's great for those new to running or looking to improve their endurance.
6. **Garmin Connect**: If you have a Garmin watch or device, this app is a great choice. It tracks your runs, provides detailed analytics, and offers training plans.
7. **Runtastic**: A feature-rich app that tracks your runs, provides audio cues, and offers personalized training plans. It also integrates with many wearables and has a social aspect.

All of these apps are available for both iOS and Android devices.

To help you improve your time, I recommend setting specific goals and tracking your progress regularly. Here are some additional tips:

* Create a structured training plan with gradual increases in distance and intensity.
* Incorporate interval training, hill repeats, or speed workouts to improve your speed and endurance.
* Focus on proper form and technique to reduce your risk of injury and improve efficiency.
* Join a running community or find a running buddy to stay motivated and accountable.

Remember to listen to your body and rest when needed. With consistent training and dedication, you'll be crushing your personal best times in no time!
